department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Tutorial-Senior Year
course.faculty_text: Johanna Damgaard Liander and members of the Department
course.description: Weekly individual instruction for honors seniors writing a thesis. Completion of two terms of Spanish 99 is required of all seniors pursuing a thesis honors track.
course.prerequisites: Satisfactory completion of a junior tutorial and faculty approval of proposed thesis topic.
course.notes: For honors seniors writing a thesis. Successful completion of two terms of Spanish 99 is required of all thesis-track honors concentrators. Students who do not complete a thesis are required to submit a substantial paper in order to receive either half course or full course credit.
